cause.description:
"Established in 1972, Feminists for Life is a nonsectarian, nonpartisan, grassroots organization that seeks real solutions to the challenges women face. Our efforts are shaped by the core feminist values of justice, nondiscrimination, and nonviolence. Feminists for Life continues the tradtion of early American feminists such as Susan B. Anthony, who opposed abortion."
1. Women deserve better choices than abortion.
2. Abortion is the cause of societies failure to meet the needs of women.
3. There is potential in every human life.
cause.mission: Eliminate the causes that drive women to abortions
cause.name: Feminists for Life
